author: Adam Wells
title: Avs' Gabe Landeskog: 2 Players Who Tested Positive for COVID-19 Have Recovered
description: There appears to be good news for two members of the  Colorado Avalanche  who previously tested positive for the coronavirus.   Per  Adrian Dater  of 104.3 The Fan, Avalanche captain Gabriel Landeskog announced Tuesday that both players have recovered...
content:
Matt Slocum/Associated Press
There appears to be good news for two members of the Colorado Avalanche who previously tested positive for the coronavirus.
